mapper.insert: insert into bd_check_pros (cpid, checkid, groupid, proid, sfzz, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag) values (#{cpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_check_pros set checkid = #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proid = #{proid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfzz = #{sfzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cpid = #{cpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cpid, checkid, groupid, proid, sfzz, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_pros where cpid = #{cpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cpid, checkid, groupid, proid, sfzz, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_pros
